result.eng: Peadar, weren't you on holiday recently in Boston?

result.ga: Tá Peadar níos óige ná Darren

result.eng: I am going to a film with Peadar tomorrow night.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul chuig scannán le Peadar san oíche amárach
